name: The Scapegoat Complex (Pre-Alpha Demo)
description:
(Game Pad Required) Welcome, friends! Here's what we have developed so far on our quest to make the greatest game of all time. 

Get ready to fight your way to the top of Sheist City. Be weary of the feet you step on to get there. The Scapegoat Complex is an open-world sandbox survival video game.

Extremely early development build! Please refresh the page if you fall through the floor or get stuck somewhere.
